thread.title: Former Trump Supporter Regrets Supporting Him
thread.title_full: Former Trump Supporter Regrets Supporting Him | POPSUGAR News

author: Victoria Messina
title: Former Trump Supporter Regrets Supporting Him
text:
CNN: A grieving father made financial sacrifices to follow Trump across the country. Now, he wishes he hadn't pic.twitter.com/9V4GRRerWN
â€” Adam Parkhomenko (@AdamParkhomenko) March 22, 2017
Kraig Moss was once Donald Trump's most loyal supporter. He dropped everything to attend 45 of the POTUS's campaign rallies across the US with his cowboy hat and guitar in tow. The grieving father, who had lost his son to a heroin addiction, followed Trump because of his promises to provide help for people addicted to drugs. But now, in response to the new Republican healthcare plan, Moss is speaking up on how he thinks Trump hasn't lived up to his campaign promises. Watch the video above to hear more about this former supporter's moving story.
